newsitem.title: USA: More info sought on Rational Software deal.
newsitem.headline: More info sought on Rational Software deal.

text.p: Rational Software Corp and Pure Atria Corp said early Monday they have received a request for additional information from the Department of Justice in connection with their planned merger.
The request extends the waiting period under the Hart-Scott-Rodino antitrust law during during which the Justice Department is permitted to review the proposed transaction.
The deal, which was announced in early April, has an estimated value of $839 million.
The companies said they intend to promptly furnish the Justice Department with all information necessary for the timely completion of its investigation.
The companies said they still anticipate closing the proposed merger, under which Rational Software is to acquire Pure Atria, by mid-August.
